name: Mindworks: The Great Division
description:
A visual novel based on science and art, real life events and how humans tend to spread a false ideology of knowledge. Welcome to the Mindworks universe!



In a universe vastly different from our own, humankind is ruled by science and art. These disciplines lived in partial unity, enough for the universe to function, prosper and evolve. Until a new discipline emerges, challenging their ability to stay together under severe circumstances and harsh pasts.

Each and every one of your choices will determine whether humankind will fall or rise again, since their fate is closely intertwined with the disciplines' unity or complete division. The key to eternal knowledge is in your hands. Choose wisely.


Multiple Outcomes: Three outcomes that are based on your choices which will decide whether the disciplines will end up being united, divided, or partially united
Different types of choices: From major choices, to timed choices, to split choices, all will affect your plotline
Webcomic Meets Visual Novel: Sprites containing fully drawn scenes and animations that mimic that style of modern webcomics
Music room: A special page in-game containing official Mindworks soundtracks to be unlocked and enjoyed
Extra content: Unlock concept art, character info, and music in the music room
